title: Jamie Hill (rugby union)
text:
Jamie Hill (born 14 June 1999) is a Welsh <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing for <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a> and side <a href="Cardiff%20Blues">Cardiff Blues</a>. His preferred position is <a href="Scrum-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">scrum-half</a>.
Cardiff Blues.
Hill is a member of the Cardiff Blues academy squad. He made his Cardiff Blues debut in Round 3 of the <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20Pro14">2020–21 Pro14</a> against <a href="Munster%20Rugby">Munster</a>.
